title: Student Personal Information Protection in Online Environments: Civic Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and understanding of personal information concepts
context.additional_context: Targets secondary education institution parents or community educators, addressing practical responses to personal information protection issues in online learning. Structured as a combination of in-person workshops and asynchronous online modules.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the procedures for handling student personal information on an online education platform.
Learners can identify data breach risk factors and propose at least three preventive measures.
Learners can analyze an educational institutionâ€™s personal information protection policy and suggest improvements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
